text: Mohamed Al-Saadi (born 1 January 1968) is a Yemeni long-distance runner who competed internationally for Yemen at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==Career== Al- Saadi competed in the marathon at the 1996 Summer Olympics held in Atlanta, United States,in the marathon there were 124 starting athletes, and Al-Saadi recorded a time of 2 hours 40 minutes to finish in 101st position. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Yemeni male long-distance runners Category:Olympic athletes of Yemen Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1996 Summer Olympics
title: Mohamed Al-Saadi
